title: quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=update not working
body:
### Describe the bug

The setting

**quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=drop-and-create**

works by creating the database schema, however, the config

**quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=update**

which in previous versions also created the scheme stopped creating (using as database postgress 13.3 )

### Expected behavior

Still create the database schema

### Actual behavior

Does not create the schema causing issues during the dev

### How to Reproduce?

Just set the config
quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=update
 in a database without the schema defined in 
 quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.default-schema=altair_user
